evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: On this 29th day of February, 2012, after review and consideration of the Joint Motion of the Plaintiff Class and the Settling Defendant for Preliminary Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement [Dkt. 770], ...

extracted.value: 29th February 2012: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: 7.  The Court hereby retains jurisdiction solely for the purposes set forth in the Settlement Agreement.

extracted.value: Indefinite (the Court retains jurisdiction solely for the purposes set forth in the Settlement Agreement).

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: 1.  Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement was entered into between the Settling Defendant and the Settlement Class in good faith and without collusion.

extracted.value: Settlement Agreement was entered into between the Settling Defendant and the Settlement Class in good faith and without collusion.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: 2.  Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement is fair, adequate, and reasonable.

extracted.value: Settlement Agreement is fair, adequate, and reasonable.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: 3.  Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement is hereby approved.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: 4.  This action is hereby dismissed with prejudice, subject to the retention of jurisdiction as hereafter provided.

extracted.value: Case dismissed with prejudice, subject to the retention of jurisdiction as hereafter provided.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: 5.  Each Settlement Class Member is hereby deemed conclusively to have released the Released Claims against the Released Parties.

extracted.value: Each Settlement Class Member is hereby deemed conclusively to have released the Released Claims against the Released Parties.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: 6.  Each Settlement Class Member is hereby barred and permanently enjoined from prosecuting, commencing or continuing any of the Released Claims against the Released Parties.

extracted.value: Each Settlement Class Member is hereby barred and permanently enjoined from prosecuting, commencing or continuing any of the Released Claims against the Released Parties.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: 7.  The Court hereby retains jurisdiction solely for the purposes set forth in the Settlement Agreement.

extracted.value: The Court hereby retains jurisdiction solely for the purposes set forth in the Settlement Agreement.
